performances.title: Spring Jazz Concert
performances.description: Our biggest performance of the year! Join us for an evening of jazz classics and original compositions.

performances.title: Performance at Oakmont Senior Center
performances.description: An afternoon of jazz classics for the residents. We love these intimate performances and sharing music across generations.

performances.title: DVHS Quad Jam Session
performances.description: Join us for a casual lunchtime performance in the quad. We'll be playing some upbeat tunes to brighten your day.

performances.title: Wellness Center Performance
performances.description: Playing some smooth, relaxing jazz to support the school's wellness events. Music is good for the soul!

performances.title: Winter Arts Festival
performances.description: A showcase of all the arts programs at DVHS. We'll be opening the show with some exciting new pieces.

performances.title: Valentine's Day Grams
performances.description: Our small ensembles will be delivering musical Valentine's Day grams throughout the school.

performances.title: Guest Artist Workshop
performances.description: A special workshop and jam session with a local professional jazz musician. Open to all club members.
